summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5634 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 19, Replat of a portion of Pleasant Valley Addition, being the alley between 29th Avenue West and 30th Avenue West, from West Dravus Street to West Bertona Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 74348, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
